decision_conditions: The submitted details fail to ensure that risks from land contamination to the future users of the land and neighbouring land are minimised, together with those to controlled waters, property and ecological systems and the development can be carried out safely without unacceptable risks to workers, neighbours and other offsite receptors in accordance with Policy DMEI 11, DMEI 12 and DMEI 13 of The Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (2020).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions(s) 13 part (ii) (Remediation Scheme), part (iii)( Verification Report), part (iv) (Contamination) of planning permission ref. 75240/APP/2021/4431, dated 31-01-22 (Construction of 2 bungalows with dormers, parking spaces, changes to existing crossover and all associated external works.)
